PositionQualification.name: PositionQualification
PositionQualification.description: Represents a position-based qualification. For example, Communication Skills for a Program and Management Analyst position.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the position qualification.

PositionId.description: Required. The position that's related to the position qualification.

QualificationReferenceRecordId.description: Required. A lookup to the record that confirms the qualification.
